title: Should Christians Vote Red In 2024? |  Unapologetic 95
itunes:title: Should Christians Vote Red In 2024? |  Unapologetic 95
description: No perfect candidates are running for political office because there are no perfect people. But should Christians vote Red in upcoming elections? Theology and politics collide on this episode of the Unapologetic show.
